ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lets see, at one point I had... Blackened Iron Crown Lambent BP Barbed arm plates Bronze bracers Lambent gloves Shin greaves Bronze boots So all total that is
ygData.messageBody:
Lets see, at one point I had...
Blackened Iron Crown
Lambent BP
Barbed arm plates
Bronze bracers
Lambent gloves
Shin greaves
Bronze boots

So all total that is a wood elf with black head, blue chest, gray arms,
orange wrists, blue gloves, silver pants and orange feet..... very very
very bad. It was a nightmare. I cleaned up my act though and look much
better now.

-Steve

At 11:05 AM 11/3/00 -0500, you wrote:
>Well i topped off my bad looks yesterday... I'm a wood elf with:
>
>ss helm
>ss gloves
>ss boots
>hero bracer ... Not too bad right? lotsa green.
>
>My other stuff includes:
>lambent bracer
>lambent legs
>lambent arms.. add in the blue
>
>tree weave
>mith bp
>worn cloth mantle
>guise of deceiver
>rune bone fork
>troll hide belt
>2 yaks
>mm drum & nos tamborine
>gypsie princess lute
>
>various jewelry
>
>Well last night i topped off my ugly look by replacing my lambent bracer for
>a Kylong Wrist guard (same stats but more charisma). THE BRACER IS BROWNISH
>RED!! i freaked out when i saw it, it keeps overwriting my hero bracer
>look. I never though i could look worse but oh boy when i put that on did i
>ever freak.
>
>While i'm auctioning, some twink bard in full lambent at lev 12 pops up to
>me asks me what i wanted for my hero bracer (im auctioning it because i have
>a spare) then after a wee bit says oh nm, i thought you were a twink and
>not a real player. Talk about kicking me while im down.
>
>Sooo anyways, that kicked me in the butt severely and now im really
>determined to powerlevel instead of grouping (which i would much rather do).
>I have to kiss my lambent and tree weave goodbye soon and get some imbrued,
>im tired of looking like all the twinks with various ss and lambent. Dont
>get me wrong, i have nothing against twinking but man im sick of passing for
>something that is 20-30 levels lower then i really am.
>
>Arg sorry for the rant
>
>Minkin
>almost lev 42 bard
>The Menace of Rathe Mountains
>Sol ro
